Name: Pleasure to Tell
Ingredients: 15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Review: A stirred cognac-based after dinner drink with rich cherry notes and subtle almond and chocolate, freshened with orange oils.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2015 by Jolanta Ewa Malczewska at Holmen Bar in Stavanger, Norway.
Nutrition: One serving of Pleasure to Tell contains 173 calories
